description: These kaomoji emoticons are so in love that they have hearts for eyes. Everything they see must be completely tinted with love. You can use either a black heart (♥) or a white one (♡) for these loving eyes. I wonder what these emotes are in love with..  (●♡∀♡) (｡♥‿♥｡) (♥ω♥ ) ~♪ (♥ω♥*) (✿ ♥‿♥) ✿♥‿♥✿ 乂❤‿❤乂 ٩(♡ε♡ )۶ ლζ*♡ε♡*ζლ ⊂（♡⌂♡）⊃ (๑♡3♡๑) (๑♡⌓♡๑) ♱♡‿♡♰ ⊆♥_㇁♥⊇ (●♡∀♡))ヾ☆*。 ໒( ♥ ◡ ♥ )७ ༼♥ل͜♥༽ (灬♥ω♥灬)
title: Love Eyes
